meta.mission: Regenerative architecture, mindful wellness, and immersive design in the heart of Bali.
meta.tagline: A sanctuary where recycled bamboo, hand-carved stone, and living water shape every detail.

hero.headline: Return to nature in regenerative luxury.
hero.subheadline: A sanctuary suspended between handcrafted architecture, biodiverse jungle, and the rhythms of flowing water.
hero.description: Crafted with reclaimed materials and guided by permaculture, Ulaman invites you to feel the cadence of Bali through villas carved into the canopy, a gravity-defying bamboo lounge, and holistic rituals led by local healers.

meta.weatherTagline: 28°C · Gentle breeze from the rice terraces

parallaxSlices.title: Regenerative Architecture
parallaxSlices.subtitle: Designed with bamboo, earth, and zero concrete foundations.
parallaxSlices.copy: Every structure curves with the land, aerodynamically bending sound and air to keep the retreat naturally cooled. Award-winning bamboo domes and earth-bag villas were crafted by Balinese artisans, celebrating biomimicry and local craftsmanship.

media.alt: Sculptural bamboo architecture in the jungle

parallaxSlices.title: Living Water Sanctuary
parallaxSlices.subtitle: A cascade of natural pools, waterfalls, and healing hydrotherapy.
parallaxSlices.copy: Fed by spring water and mineralized stone, the hydrotherapy circuit, floating yoga deck, and river lounge curate a multisensory journey designed to restore nervous system balance.

media.alt: Infinity pool overlooking Balinese rice terraces

parallaxSlices.title: Holistic Wellness & Rituals
parallaxSlices.subtitle: Curated by resident healers and visiting practitioners.
parallaxSlices.copy: Sunrise sound ceremonies, cacao-infused breathwork, and Balinese herbal apothecary treatments are tailored to regulate circadian rhythm and unlock deep rest.

media.alt: Wellness ritual with singing bowls in Bali

highlights.title: Living Permaculture
highlights.copy: Hydroponic gardens, rewilded rice terraces, and organic kitchens that spotlight Balinese ingredients.

highlights.title: Closed-Loop Energy
highlights.copy: Micro-hydro power, solar arrays, and waste-to-resource systems keep the retreat off-grid ready.

highlights.title: Immersive Design
highlights.copy: Spatial acoustics, biomorphic lighting, and sightlines curated to mimic rainforest layers.

articles.title: Designing the Bamboo Renaissance
articles.excerpt: How Ulaman collaborated with IBUKU to sculpt open-air spaces that breathe with the jungle.

image.alt: Bamboo dome interior lit with warm light

articles.title: Rituals of Rest with Resident Healers
articles.excerpt: Restorative soundscapes, plant therapies, and somatic movement sequences to recalibrate body and mind.

articles.title: Mindful Cuisine from Garden to Table
articles.excerpt: Inside Ulaman's regenerative culinary program featuring zero-waste menus and hyperlocal spices.

image.alt: Gourmet plant-based dish served on stoneware

offerings.title: Canopy Villas
offerings.description: Suspended above the river, the canopy villas blend curved bamboo architecture with sky bridges and wrap-around decks for uninterrupted jungle immersion.
features: Infinity plunge pool with mineralized water

image.alt: Luxury villa overlooking lush tropical forest

offerings.title: Earth Retreats
offerings.description: Earth-bag sanctuaries shaped with rammed earth and river stone to regulate temperature naturally and ground the senses.
features: Rain shower carved into lava stone

offerings.title: River Residences
offerings.description: Expansive multi-level residences with private cinema, hydrotherapy deck, and chef's kitchen for curated gatherings.

image.alt: Modern residence with open living area
